institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Continuing employment incentive payment and operating rules/Article 9 (decision and notification of payment, etc.)
contents: Article 9 (Decision on payment and notification, etc.) ① If the payment applicant satisfies the payment requirements as a result of the examination in accordance with Articles 6, 7 and 8, the Chairman of the Board confirms the payment and reports the results in the appendix to the Enforcement Rules. Notification shall be made according to the Article 16 form., ② If the payment applicant does not meet the payment requirements as a result of the examination in accordance with Articles 6, 7, and 8, the Chairman shall specify the reasons for the decision to make a false payment in Form No. 5. Notification must be made., ③ The deadline for notification of the decision on payment under Paragraphs 1 and 2 shall be September 30th of each year., ④ The Chairman shall provide payment by December 31st of the relevant year to applicants for whom payment has been made in error pursuant to Paragraph 2. It can be re-examined.
